plot: BMO narrates "The Great Gum War" in which Finn, Jake, Marceline, PB and the Candy Kingdom go to war against Gumbald and his army that will determine the fate of Ooo once and for all.

A war happens between Princess Bubblegum and her uncle Gumbald, while Betty captures Ice King to do one last thing. Princess Bubblegum retreats and Gumbald takes over the Candy Kingdom, combining it with Gumbaldia making a central power in Ooo. Golb interferes for once and for all. Are you ready for the ULTIMATE ADVENTURE?—Adventure Time
